name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No More Feed - More Focus, Happier Scrolling

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the twitter trending feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve focus and reduce nonsense by removing the feed panel from Twitter. This was just a fun little extension I made, and it's saved me a lot of time and sanity, hopefully it makes your day a little better.

Be good to each other, and party on.
